title: Data Type Analyzer
description: Create a program that takes in a value and determines its data type. The program should then output the data type and perform a specific action based on the data type. For example, if the input is a string, the program should output the length of the string. If the input is an integer, the program should output the square of the integer. If the input is a float, the program should output the cube of the float.
sample_output: The data type of the input is string. The length of the string is 5.
